name: THE BEAST (Visual Novel)
description:
(THE BEAST contains themes of an adult nature - you must be 18 or older to play)

THE BEAST is a role-playing horror visual novel about a world filled by terrifying monsters named "BEAST", a demonic species that hungers for human flesh and blood. A company of Alchemia Corp, hired a special team called "BEAST Hunters" to hunt down and eliminate them. It was at this moment, Eric, a teenage boy who lives a smooth life without going out in a clean house, gradually learned that he is not a human...
